did.unittitle: Racism Lives Here Too Movement records
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 36-48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: While Special Collections is the owner of the physical and digital items, permission to examine collection materials is not an authorization to publish. These materials are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study. Any transmission or reproduction beyond that allowed by fair use requires permission from the owners of rights, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Racism Lives Here Too Movement records (SC1404). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs depicting Stanford Law School students with a banner stating "Racism Lives Here Too," as well as posters bearing quotes attributed to Stanford students and professors. The banner and posters were hung at Stanford Law School in February 2018 by students associated with the Racism Lives Here Too Movement.

did.unittitle: Posters
Your English is so good - said at SLS, Racism Lives Here Too
You guys should take cultural appropriation as a compliment - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Disparate impact should be unconstitutional. Certain racial groups are just more obedient than others - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Minimum wage workers can’t debase themselves any further - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Minority students are not as intelligent as white students - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
How much force are the police legally allowed to use against black people? - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Can I see your Stanford ID?…There’s been so much package theft recently - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Rich people’s time is more valuable than poor people’s time - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
If someone is really starving, slavery starts to seem like a great deal. You get free food and shelter and only have to give up a few rights - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Okay, but it’s not like students at SLS experience racism. Like once you get to this level, racism doesn’t exist - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
I have trouble with Chinese names. I am much better with German or Italian names - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
I love the vibrancy and diversity of your people - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
What happened to George Zimmerman was a travesty of justice. He should never have been charged in the first place - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
I wish they would focus on diversity that actually mattered -said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Black people just commit more crime - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
An SLS student of color was personally targeted with anonymous racist hate mail. That is not the work of strangers - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Mexicans are diluting our country - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Why should we pay for the education of an illegal’s children? - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
I just don’t think Asian boys are attractive - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
How does it feel to be rich and black? You know, since most black people are poor - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
Don’t you have something to add on this discussion on racial disparities? - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
That’s such a good LSAT score for someone of your race - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
I forget you’re black sometimes! - said at SLS. Racism Lives Here Too
